mapper.select: SELECT fc_java.team_info.* FROM fc_java.team_info JOIN fc_java.pl_info ON fc_java.team_info.t_num = fc_java.pl_info.t_num WHERE fc_java.pl_info.id = #{id} order by fc_java.pl_info.pl_ap_date desc;
SELECT * FROM fc_java.team_info ORDER BY t_c_day DESC LIMIT 3;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM fc_java.pl_info WHERE t_num=#{t_num} and id=#{id};
mapper.select: SELECT sta_booking.b_date as reserdate, sta_booking.b_tiem as resertime, stadium1.g_name as groundname, stadium1.g_add as groundaddr, sta_booking.b_bk_tiem as receiptdate, sta_booking.b_vs_team as vs_team, sta_booking.b_vs_team_num as vs_team_num, IFNULL(team_info.t_logo, null) AS vs_team_logo, IFNULL(team_info.t_name, null) AS vs_team_name FROM sta_booking JOIN stadium1 ON sta_booking.b_ground_no = stadium1.g_no LEFT JOIN team_info ON sta_booking.b_vs_team_num = team_info.t_num WHERE sta_booking.b_team_no = #{teamNumber} ORDER BY sta_booking.b_date DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fc_java.t_formation (t_num, formation, formation_name, position_num, player_id) VALUES (#{t_num},#{formation},#{formation_name},#{position_num},#{player_id});
mapper.select: SELECT game.game_name, gr1.game_type, gr1.game_date, game.game_place, team1.t_logo as team1_logo,team1.t_name as team1_name, gr1.team1_score, team2.t_logo as team2_logo, team2.t_name as team2_name, gr1.team2_score FROM game_result gr1 JOIN game ON gr1.game_num = game.game_num JOIN team_info AS team1 ON gr1.team1_num = team1.t_num JOIN team_info AS team2 ON gr1.team2_num = team2.t_num WHERE (gr1.team1_num = #{teamNumber} OR gr1.team2_num = #{teamNumber}) AND gr1.game_num IN ( SELECT temp.game_num FROM ( SELECT game_num, MIN(game_type) AS min_game_type FROM game_result WHERE team1_num = #{teamNumber} OR team2_num = #{teamNumber} GROUP BY game_num ) AS temp WHERE gr1.game_num = temp.game_num AND gr1.game_type = temp.min_game_type ) ORDER BY gr1.game_date DESC;
mapper.update: CREATE TABLE board_${t_num} ( `board_num` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `board_id` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `board_title` varchar(45) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `board_content` text COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `board_file` varchar(45) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, `board_readcount` int(11) NOT NULL, `board_createdate` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `board_lastupdate` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`board_num`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin

SELECT * FROM board_${t_num} order by board_createdate desc limit ${startrow},${endrow};
